comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): number of top-loading machines
- \( y \): number of front-loading machines

Definitions:
- \( x \): \( x \geq 0 \), integer
- \( y \): \( y \geq 0 \), integer
- Number of items washed by top-loading model per day: 50 items
- Number of items washed by front-loading model per day: 75 items
- Energy consumed by top-loading model per day: 85 kWh
- Energy consumed by front-loading model per day: 100 kWh
- Minimum number of items to be washed per day: 5000 items
- Maximum energy available per day: 7000 kWh
- Maximum percentage of top-loading machines: 40%
- Minimum number of front-loading machines: 10 machines

Objective:
Minimize the total number of washing machines purchased.
